Name: WAVE RIDER
About the game: WAVE RIDER is dazzling game where you race against time inspired by classic arcade games. Reach blazing-fast velocities and discover the surreal, sights this universe enveloped in neon lights has to offer, in a driving simulation that has been hijacked by a mysterious hacker group. Master the physics bending machines you'll encounter, switch between different wave forms to unlock your rider's power and overcome the various challenges featured within the environment. Main features Boost, Control Time, and Repair your ship on the go. Choose your favorite Rider from a selection that will challenge your skills. Intricate turns and twists waiting for you to master them. A unique story you can enjoy at your own pace in the Story mode, or speed through in the Hardcore mode.
